name: terminative
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the end of something, or causing an end to something: "And that's all I have to say about that," he said with terminative emphasis. The sacking of the capital city and surrender of the army turned out to be the terminative action of the war.
More examplesFewer examplesThe Minister of War said that the air strike was a setback but not a terminative event. When the partnership didn't work out, the company invoked the terminative clause to extract itself from the agreement.
